ca.ualberta.team7project.controllers

Class ThreadListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • ca.ualberta.team7project.controllers.ThreadListController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class ThreadListController
extends android.app.Activity
    Manages the active list of comments

    Contains methods for refreshing, adding, and editing comments

    Manages the internal comment-nesting stack and handles navigation between different nesting levels

    • Method Detail

      • initiateServerPolling

        public void initiateServerPolling()
        Polls elastic search for updates every 30 seconds

      • refreshThreads

        public void refreshThreads()
        If a network connection exists, pull the latest and greatest from ElasticSearch

        ThreadListModel is populated with the results from ElasticSearch

      • addFavorite

        public void addFavorite(ThreadModel thread,
               ThreadListView.FavoriteMode fm)
        When a user clicks on the Favorite button, the ThreadModel UUID is added
        Parameters:
        thread - which the user clicked on

      • getFavorites

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.UUID> getFavorites()
        When called, PreferenceModel will return the UUIDs of favoriteComments.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of UUIDs marked as favorites

      • editThread

        public void editThread(ThreadModel thread)
        Responds to the users desire to edit a thread.

        editingTopic is set to true to represent that the user is editing a topic. The thread is saved in expectation that the user will finish the prompt and that the new model can be updated and inserted into the appropriate persistence models in other methods.

        Parameters:
        thread - that the user is editing

      • replyThread

        public void replyThread(ThreadModel thread)
        Responds to the users desire to reply to a thread.

        editingTopic is set to false to represent that we are not editing a topic, and setInTopic is true to represent that we are not creating a new topic and are in an existing topic.

        The thread we are replying to is saved in expectation that the user will finish the prompt and add the reply to the thread, whereupon it is inserted into the appropriate model in other methods

        Parameters:
        thread - that the user is replying to

      • editTags

        public void editTags(ThreadModel thread)
        Responds to the user's desire to append or delete tags from a ThreadModel.

        The thread to be edited passed to the TagAlertView and then returned to the controller after the modifications have been made.

        Parameters:
        thread - The thread for the tags the user wished to edit.

      • InsertThread

        public void InsertThread(ThreadModel thread)
        Persist a new or updated thread into the cache and elastic search
        Parameters:
        thread - to be inserted

      • createThread

        public void createThread(java.lang.String title,

                LocationModel location,
                android.graphics.Bitmap cameraPhoto,
                java.lang.String tags)
        Creates a new thread and inserts it into the model in response to a click listener.
        Parameters:
        title - of the thread
        body - of the thread
